title: Blackscreen on tv
body: Hello... I hve no monitor.... so i use my tv as monitor but i cant play lol cuz i hear sounds but theres just a blackscreen.... can someone give me the hotkey to make it windowed...... Thanks^^{{item:3642}}

replies.body: You can switch between fullscreen and windowed by hitting ALT+ENTER. That should make the game visible, but let me know if it doesn't!
IT WORKED... but it was not alt+enter, it was (right)contol+enter......... thanks
